ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.0.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.0'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A climate4R wrapper of the climdex.pcic package implementing ETCCDI Climate Indices <http://etccdi.pacificclimate.org/list_27_indices.shtml>.
A climate4R wrapper of the climdex.pcic package implementing ETCCDI Climate Indices <http://etccdi.pacificclimate.org/list_27_indices.shtml>.

name: r-climate4r.climdex
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-climate4r.climdex
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/climate4R.climdex/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d5b11259394ae0feb869f903a6acf3d35add8dbf281bb2fa11f5622cc9f9df9d

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}git
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-pcict
    - r-climdex.pcic >=1.1_6
    - r-magrittr
    - r-transformer >=1.4.4
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-pcict
    - r-climdex.pcic >=1.1_6
    - r-magrittr
    - r-transformer >=1.4.4

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('climate4R.climdex')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('climate4R.climdex')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/climate4R
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: A climate4R wrapper of the climdex.pcic package implementing ETCCDI Climate Indices <http://etccdi.pacificclimate.org/list_27_indices.shtml>.
  dev_url: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/climate4R.climdex
  doc_url: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/climate4R.climdex
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - cofinoa


# Package: climate4R.climdex
# Title: Climate Change Index calculation for climate4R data
# Version: 0.2.1
# Date: 2019-04-16
# Description: A climate4R wrapper of the climdex.pcic package implementing ETCCDI Climate Indices <http://etccdi.pacificclimate.org/list_27_indices.shtml>.
# Depends: R (>= 3.4.0), climdex.pcic (>= 1.1-6)
# Imports: PCICt, transformeR (>= 1.4.4), magrittr, parallel
# Suggests: loadeR, visualizeR
# Authors@R: as.person(c( "Santander Meteorology Group <http://meteo.unican.es> [cph]", "Joaquin Bedia <bediaj@unican.es> [aut,cre]", "Sixto Herrera <herreras@unican.es> [ctb]", "Maialen Iturbide <miturbide@ifca.unican.es> [ctb]"))
# BugReports: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/climate4R.climdex/issues
# URL: http://meteo.unican.es/climate4R
# License: GPL (>= 3)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
